title: I use vladmiers q to last hit, does that make me lazy?

replies.body:
hardly....it makes you resourceful. all manaless champs use low CD spells to last hit....unless it can easily be used for poke...use it to last hit.

it also helps you sustain anyway.

early game
depends, not really, you can be using it trade, high cd 

late game
go for it , low cd
Given that it ends up with less than 3 sec cooldown, no, not at all
You're meant to last hit with Vlad's Q, it's the best ability for lasthitting.
couldnt be more wrong, good job you've done it again.

> [{quoted}](name=Officer Caitlyn,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=u01F5eGK,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-03-10T14:38:54.698+0000)
>
> couldnt be more wrong, good job you've done it again.

Read the tooltip for it.
2s cooldown, instant damage, you should be using it early game as vlads autos suck doodle.

if you can get away with not needing to harass the enemy champ with his Q, then lasthitting with it is fine, especially at lvl 1 when vlad's autos are horrible. Once you hit lvl 4 (or even 3) and take E you can use that to last hit multiple minions (auto the minions not getting attacked, then cast E when you can get a few of them) while harrassing the enemy laner with Q. once you hit lvl 9+ the cooldown on your Q is so low anyway that you can use it to cs and harrass.
"not needing to harass the enemy champ with his Q" when is that the case? never. If you use E to push the wave you're asking to get smacked before getting a spell vamp item. u pleb. get good
